body:
I manage to find the answer. It was gulp-eslint, he doesn't recognize the ES2015 syntax. When I added the code below to eslint gulp task the tests run fine. 

{
  ecmaFeatures: {
    modules: true
  },
  envs: [
    'browser', 'es6'
  ],
  parserOptions: {
    sourceType: 'module'
  }
}

The whole task:

gulp.task('static', function () {
  return gulp.src('**/*.js')
    .pipe(excludeGitignore())
    .pipe(eslint({
      ecmaFeatures: {
        modules: true
      },
      envs: [
        'browser', 'es6'
      ],
      parserOptions: {
        sourceType: 'module'
      }
    }))
    .pipe(eslint.format())
    .pipe(eslint.failAfterError());
});
title: Yeoman fail with gulp in babel (es2015)
